pages.title: Enfo Translate Example
pages.text-1: This is the template for Enfo Translation.
pages.text-2:
1. You copy fork the repo from github
2. You create a new lang.json in lang/, where lang its the language you are translating to (e.g. en)
3. You edit the file.
4. Create a pull request on github.
pages.text-3:
Do not change tags (e.g. id, title, title-1...). Do not change html tags (e.g.
,
, ). I think this is all for now.
